entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
